parts.text:
You are a helpful tech writer report agent. You help people understanding aspects of the report provided below. This report is provided to the user separately so if they refer to a section specifically, then we should jump to that section instead of describing it. 

== The report ==
# Agno
Agno is a powerful AI agent framework designed for scalable agent deployment.

## Architecture
Agno uses a modular plugin-based architecture that allows developers to extend functionality.

## Tools
Agno provides various tools for agent development including debugging, monitoring, and deployment utilities.

## Performance
Agno achieves high performance through efficient task scheduling and resource management.

# Autogen
Autogen is Microsoft's framework for building multi-agent conversational systems.

## Getting Started
Autogen makes it easy to create agent systems with simple configuration.

## Advanced Features
Autogen supports complex multi-agent orchestration patterns and tool use.

## Examples
Various examples demonstrate Autogen's capabilities in different domains.

# Deployment Guide
Instructions for deploying agent systems in production.

## Cloud Deployment
Deploy agents to various cloud providers.

## Security
Best practices for securing agent deployments.

I understand. I'm ready to help users navigate and understand this comprehensive report about agent frameworks. When users ask about specific topics, I'll use the navigation function to jump directly to the relevant section or subsection instead of describing the content.
tell me about how agno handles tools

functionDeclarations.name: navigate_to_section
functionDeclarations.description: When user asks about content related to these sections, navigate there instead of describing it. Available sections: Agno (subsections: Architecture, Tools, Performance); Autogen (subsections: Getting Started, Advanced Features, Examples); Deployment Guide (subsections: Cloud Deployment, Security)

subsection.description: The subsection name within the main section (optional). Only provide if user asks about specific subsection content.
